Body:
There is rarely a one-to-one mapping from sequences of sound to sequences of letters. The extent to which the same sound will be represented using different spellings will depend on issues such as historical usage (e.g., dialect changes over time), how the word was derived (e.g., whether it was borrowed from another language) and these days the demands of the advertising industry.

The slike tool will generate words that sound like a given word and there are various options that let you play around with generating different spellings (you will need to know technical stuff about compiling programming language source code).
